comments.body: Any reason you're using a callable object type here instead of a function type?

I copied the line from the other instance above, for consistency, but I'd be happy to update both cases if that's a prefered syntax.
```ts
matchHeader(name: string, value: string | RegExp | ((value: string) => boolean)): this;
```

Docs: https://github.com/nock/nock#activemocks

This line needs to be duplicated on the `Scope` interface too. (after line 84 below)
